info.name: Sleek plan | A Week Plan.net night mode
info.description:
A dark theme for weekplan.net
Created primarily for my personal use. Will be improved and updated with time.
info.additionalInfo:
0.1
  • Re-styled most of the website for a dark theme
  • Removed a lot of strange borders
  • Made React and JQuery UI-s a bit more consistent, or at least resembling each other.
  • 4 role colors were changed to match the new dark colors
  • Fixed the transparency error of the older looking logo in the Journal page
  • Removed Big rock advisor
  • Long task titles should break normally and not crop anymore
Known issues CSS needs clean up Some SVG based button icons were not styled
